resources.string: Here is your monument, enter your nickname
How long will you keep clicking? How long do you think this will last?
Seriously, you want to get to a thousand?
Are you even here? Or did your fingers just decide to take another vacation?
500 clicks... Are you happy? Because I\'m definitely tired.
You know there are other ways to spend time, right?
Ready to keep going? Or are you starting to miss something more exciting?
If I could, I\'d have fallen asleep by now.
Maybe it\'s better to just take a break? You earned it.
Oh, now you\'re really breaking records. What\'s next? Off to the Moon?
Seven thousand... you must be on the brink of madness!
I\'d just turn off the computer if I were you!
You could make a statue with ten thousand clicks. Writing your name on a monument.
